abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project comprises
            installation of three 500 MW generating units together with
            ancillary equipment and related facilities at the Ramagundam
            thermal power station and construction of about 1,400 km of
            associated 400 kV transmission lines. One risk is the
            possibility of slippage in the implementation schedule,
            which could give rise to delayed commissioning of the plant
            with consequent loss of revenues.
